Message: Hi, Iâ€™m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
The user completes the submission of the form
Hey there! How can I assist you today?
can I start advertising on newsbreak?
Absolutely! You can start advertising on NewsBreak by visiting admanager.newsbreak.com. If you need any help getting started, feel free to ask!
can i speak to a real person\
I'm here to help with whatever you need! Let me know your question, and I'll do my best to assist you right away.
To check the status of your account review, could you please provide some details? If your account is new, I can guide you on the information needed for business verification.

For business verification, please provide the following details:
- Company's full address
- Company's legal entity name
- Account Email
- Company's EHID or DUNS number
- Primary contact person's name
- Company's phone number
- Business URL
Once you have these details, you can email them to adsupport@newsbreak.com with the subject line: Business Verification. This will help us conduct a thorough review and update you on your account status.
